name: Badbery
description:
Welcome to the Badbery!

Have you ever had a bad haircut? Wondered how it was being on the other side? Listening to the infinite blabling of clients who don't care about you at all? Now is your time for revenge! Do the worst haircuts possible to this clients and try to live up to their insane expectations while giving them a good conversation.

This game was made for LevelOneJam 2019. The game is currently uncomplete, the character of Nina and other features are not implemented
